name: Junely 2021
description:
I worked on this over the course of June and July 2021. 

My intention was to make a game using clay creatures and cardboard backgrounds. I used airdry clay, acrylic paint, my phone and Photopea to create all the assets in the game. 

Music and SFX are by Dustin van Wyk.  The track and voices give so much life to the world and the characters, and make everything brighter. 

Do yourself a favour, and check out Dustin's work HERE.

As always, thank you to Ben McInnes for help with the programming.
